name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with complete multi-currency integration
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: Permanent side panel with tabbed navigation
Enhanced chart breakdowns showing all savings components
Complete multi-currency integration (ILS, USD, EUR, GBP, BTC, ETH)
Dynamic form labels with currency symbols
Real-time currency conversion and value updates
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
majorChanges: FIXED: Dashboard.js selectedCurrency undefined error resolved
FIXED: Duplicate function declarations in RetirementResultsPanel.js eliminated
FIXED: Component integration test suite updated for current architecture
FIXED: Test logic for duplicate detection improved with proper regex patterns
IMPROVED: CurrencyValue component now reuses existing helper functions
IMPROVED: Variable naming to prevent false duplicate detection
IMPROVED: Test suite now handles inline initialization patterns
ENHANCED: All 87 main tests and 69 component integration tests passing
ENHANCED: Test coverage at 100% with improved error detection
QUALITY: Code refactoring to eliminate redundancy and improve maintainability
